title: Global internet usage rate 2019 , by gender and region
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of population on the Y-axis for 6 different Countrys for 2 groups Male, and Female that are presented on the X-axis.
In Country Europe, Male had the highest Share of population 849.0 among the 2 groups and in CIS, Female had the lowest Share of population 71.0.
In Country Europe, Male had the maximum Share of population and it saw the lowest in Country Africa out of all 6 Countrys.
The maximum Share of population for Male that was found in Country Europe was 2.51 times larger than the minimum Share of population observed in Country Africa.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Male, and Female. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of population.
Country Europe had the maximum Share of population among all 2 groups, and it was for Male. The minimum Share of population was observed in Country CIS for Female.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Share of population on the Y-axis for 6 different Countrys for 2 groups Male, and Female that are presented on the X-axis.
In Country Europe, Male had the highest Share of population 849.0 among the 2 groups and in CIS, Female had the lowest Share of population 71.0.
In Country Europe, Male had the maximum Share of population and it saw the lowest in Country Africa out of all 6 Countrys.
The maximum Share of population for Male that was found in Country Europe was 2.51 times larger than the minimum Share of population observed in Country Africa.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Countrys on X-axis for 2 groups Male, and Female. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Share of population.
Country Europe had the maximum Share of population among all 2 groups, and it was for Male. The minimum Share of population was observed in Country CIS for Female.
Among all the Countrys, Male had the highest Share of population in Country Europe and lowest Share of population in Country Africa.
Country Europe and Africa had the biggest gap of 511.0 between the highest and lowest Share of population found for Male.
Among all 2 groups, Male had the gap of 511.0 between the maximum and minimum Share of population observed in Country Europe and Africa respectively.
On average, the Country Europe had the highest Share of population for all 2 groups Male, and Female. Whereas Africa had the lowest average Share of population.
